mapper.select: SELECT id, title, release_year, length, rating FROM Film ORDER BY ${order} ${dir} LIMIT #{page}, 20
SELECT id, title, release_year, length, rating FROM Film ORDER BY (CASE rating WHEN 'G' THEN 5 WHEN 'PG' THEN 4 WHEN 'PG13' THEN 3 WHEN 'R' THEN 2 WHEN 'NC17' THEN 1 END) DESC LIMIT #{page}, 20

SELECT id, title, release_year, length, rating FROM Film ORDER BY (CASE rating WHEN 'G' THEN 5 WHEN 'PG' THEN 4 WHEN 'PG13' THEN 3 WHEN 'R' THEN 2 WHEN 'NC17' THEN 1 END) ASC, title ASC LIMIT #{page}, 20
